title: Interpretation of a dream about heartbeat: seeing heart disease in a dream

preview.html: Seeing heart disease for a single girl, married, pregnant woman, divorced, for a man, if the heart stops, hears the pulse, heartbeat, heart pain stops, heart attack Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Imam Al-Sadiq and others in continuation of the topic below. We often see dreams related to the heart Because the heart in our hearts is the source of feeling, emotion, love and affection, while in reality the person who does all this is the brain. The dream indicates an unsatisfactory reputation and hypocrisy, and it also indicates problems and fears, while washing the heart in a dream indicates a return to God, repentance, and overcoming difficult stages in life. Below are the detailed interpretations: Interpretation of the heartbeat in a dream: Seeing a rapid heartbeat in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will give up some things and surrender. Whoever sees the rapid pulse in a dream, this indicates staying away from enemies and embarking on a travel journey away from them. The heartbeat in a dream indicates the beginning of A trip to start a new job. Palpitations in a dream indicate a lack of patience and interest in unknown things coming your way. Seeing a fast heartbeat in a dream means moving to another country. Seeing a fast heartbeat in a dream indicates the approach of engagement and marriage in the coming period. Dreaming of a fast heartbeat means that the dreamer will face some positive changes that It will make him happy for a long time. Whoever sees that his heart is black in a dream, the dream shows that he is walking on a forbidden path that brings him nothing but sins. Interpretation of a heartbeat in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an accelerated heartbeat in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates disturbance, anxiety, and psychological problems for the dreamer. Interpretation Heartbeat in a dream for a married woman. Heartbeat in a dream for a married woman. This indicates that the dreamer feels intense jealousy to the point that her jealousy can turn into suspicion, which leads to the destruction of her relationships. Therefore, the dream portends the need to get rid of it. Interpretation of the heartbeat in a dream for a pregnant woman. The heartbeat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the dreamer is afraid of childbirth and afraid of pain, but the dream is good news for her that things will be easy and everything will be fine soon. Interpretation of pain in Heart in a dreamSeeing heartache in a dream means that the dreamer will reconcile with some party with whom he had enmity, problems, or competitors. Heartache in a dream means the return of some old relationships to their previous era. A dream of heartache indicates reconsidering some of the decisions you have made, such as the decision Travel, a marriage decision, a work decision, buying a house, or others. Ibn Sirin talks about a dream about heartache in a dream and says that this indicates that the dreamer is performing some forbidden sinful actions that forbid him from his religion. In general, heartache indicates A heart in a dream indicates hatred of worldly life, lack of interest in it, and mismanagement. Interpretation of a heart attack in a dream: Seeing a heart stopping in a dream means that the dreamer is afraid of a responsible person. A heart stopping working in a dream means that you are afraid of your work manager, your project manager, or anyone who usually

title: Interpretation of seeing a pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a married pregnant woman? Evidence of the coming of goodness and abundance of livelihood and money. What does it mean to see? Is the man pregnant in his sleep? An indication of the bright future that awaits him. What is the interpretation of a man seeing a pregnant woman and then giving birth to a child? An indication of his near satisfaction, God willing. What is the purpose of seeing a fear of pregnancy? A sign of overcoming difficulties. What is the interpretation of a girl being pregnant? An indication of problems, suffering, depression, tragedies and failures. What is the meaning of a single woman seeing herself pregnant? Evidence of the success of their own project. What is the interpretation of a man seeing his wife pregnant? It symbolizes the arrival of goodness and abundance. Seeing a pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that a dream about a man’s pregnancy has more than one meaning according to the vision. While a man’s vision of a female child being born is a sign of abundant food and goodness, but in the case of a dream about the birth of a male child, it is A sign of sadness, anxiety, and worry, and God Almighty is higher. And he knows better. But if a woman sees that she is pregnant in a dream and in reality she gives birth to a woman who is also pregnant, then she will give birth to a male. Interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is pregnant, this means that she will go through a difficult time. While seeing a married woman pregnant in a dream, It symbolizes the arrival of kindness, abundant living, and money. When a man sees a sheep in his dream, this is a sign of the bright future that awaits him. Seeing him sleeping: An old pregnant woman in a dream is a sign of a happy new beginning for the dreamer. Whoever sees a lamb in a dream, this symbolizes positive changes that will occur in his life. However, if the dreamer sees a pregnancy after praying Istikhara, this indicates problems and crises. Interpretation of seeing a pregnancy in a dream for a man. If a man sees that he is pregnant in a dream, this is a sign of knowledge and abundance of knowledge, and God knows the unseen. In a dream, this vision can also indicate fears and sorrows. Which he will soon suffer from. Seeing a man pregnant and then giving birth to a girl in a dream is an indication of his near relief, God willing. Seeing a rope for a man in a dream indicates the many burdens and responsibilities that fall on his shoulders. Anyone who dreams of pregnancy means that he will be exposed to fraud, lies, and deception. When a man sees that he is pregnant and has given birth to a son, this indicates extreme anxiety, worry, and worry. Fear of pregnancy in a dream. If a woman sees that she is afraid of pregnancy in a dream, this symbolizes excessive thinking about having children. Seeing a married woman who is afraid of pregnancy when she is not pregnant indicates anxiety. As for If a Virgo sees herself pregnant and afraid of childbirth, indicating its severity. While a pregnant woman sees that she is afraid of pregnancy and childbirth, this symbolizes an easy, natural birth. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing fear of pregnancy in a dream is a sign of overcoming difficulties. This vision can also indicate in The dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams, desires and aspirations. Seeing pregnancy in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman pregnant and having children is a sign of many good things and blessings. But if she does not want to have children and sees herself pregnant, this indicates...

title: Interpretation of cooked tomatoes in a dream and tomatoes in a dream

preview.html: A dream about tomatoes for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man: either tomato juice, eating tomato paste, tomato sauce, stealing fresh or rotten tomatoes, red and green, according to Ibn Sirin. Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others: Seeing tomatoes in a dream is a praiseworthy dream, as we see them in a dream in different forms, such as tomato juice and tomato paste in a dream. For example, when a person dreams that he is eating tomatoes in a large quantity and they taste delicious, this is evidence that this person has a wish and it will come true. That will be soon, God willing. Interpretation of cooked tomatoes in a dream: Seeing cooked tomatoes in a dream means kindness, fairness in matters, and ease of dealing. If you dream that you lost a tomato, because it indicates food, and that you did not find it, then this indicates something in which you had no part. Interpretation of tomatoes in A dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is buying tomatoes and eats a large amount of them and is not satisfied when they are delicious, then this is evidence of the fulfillment of a cherished desire for her in the near future, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is selling tomatoes in the market, this is evidence On her marriage or a close relationship with a person of high morals and with whom she will live happily, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of tomatoes in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is planting tomatoes in the ground and it is spacious and fertile, then this is evidence that she will soon become pregnant with a male child, God willing. Interpretation of tomatoes In a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is buying tomatoes and storing a large amount of them, then this is evidence of natural birth and that this woman will give birth to a very beautiful baby girl who will impress those present. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that her husband is harvesting tomatoes from the ground and they are red and large in color, then this Evidence of an easy and natural birth and that she will give birth to a boy, and God is Most High. And he knows best. Interpretation of tomatoes in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is buying tomatoes from someone in the market and stores them entirely, this is evidence that this woman will soon return to her ex-husband, God willing. And if a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is harvesting tomatoes from the ground, and it was There are many, so this is evidence that she will soon hear good and happy news, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of tomatoes in a dream for a manIf a man sees in a dream that he is planting tomatoes in the ground and there is water and fertile water, then this is evidence that the fortuneteller’s condition will change for the better. If one sees in a dream that He picks tomatoes and then sells them in the markets. This is evidence that the dreamer will find a prestigious job or travel for work soon, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Watch YouTube with tomatoes

This is evidence that the dreamer will find a prestigious job or travel for work soon, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Watch YouTube with tomatoes

title: Learn more about the interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a single woman: Seeing childbirth in a dream is a happy vision that indicates many clues. Some girls who have never been married may be surprised by this vision, and some women who do not want to have children may be surprised when they see this vision. Women seek with great passion to know the symbols expressed by the vision of childbirth, which vary based on many details of the insight and its psychological nature, and what is important to us is to mention all the connotations of childbirth, especially in one dream. Interpretation of the dream of childbirth in a dream Seeing childbirth in a dream means that you are going through a period The dreamer witnesses many changes accompanied by radical changes in the nature of the personality, the pattern of thinking, and his view of reality. The vision of birth also expresses goodness, abundance, and grace in everything the dreamer does, success in what is to come, and overcoming many obstacles that prevented moving forward and achieving the desired goal. Al-Nabulsi believes that the vision Birth expresses the end of a critical stage, the release of a great responsibility, or the death of a trial that caused the fortuneteller suffering and fatigue and lost many days from which he could have gained a lot. If a person dreams of giving birth, then this vision expresses his repentance from an old sin, reversing previous decisions that did not bear fruit, returning to God, and correcting many mistakes. If the person is sick and sees childbirth without being the child, then this vision symbolizes recovery and the end of the period. Illness that lasts with the dreamer for a long time. The vision may indicate a long journey or journey that separates the dreamer from his family. The purpose of the trip is either to obtain something material or to spend some time away where he is alone with himself and tries to understand him. More, and get out of the bad psychological state that he went through. In a situation where a person is in debt, seeing it indicates the repayment of the debt, the elimination of need, the end of the crisis, and a gradual transformation in the person’s life. Seeing childbirth is also an indication of situations that require you to intervene , and important events that you try to prepare for with every effort, projects and experiences that you decide to do and decide on. Seeing the birth of a poor person is better than seeing it in a rich person. If he is poor, then his vision shows a change in his condition for the better, as there is wealth and the ability to live after need and hardship, but if he is rich, this indicates the instability of his condition upside down and the absence of it. His money. The vision, as a whole, symbolizes new beginnings and endings for which the dreamer has closed the door and the many things that the dreamer is looking forward to coming. The birth of Ibn Sirin in a dream. In his interpretation of the birth vision, Ibn Sirin differentiated between the gender of the baby. If it was a male, the vision indicates the problems and responsibilities of life that are accumulating. On the shoulders of the dreamer and the passage of a period of sadness and anguish. . And endless fears. But if he sees the birth of a girl, then this vision shows joy, happiness, and the end of the difficult stages that the dreamer has recently gone through, as the positive and positive transformations that occur in his life and...

title: Reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream out of fear

preview.html: We will learn the opinion of scholars on this so that we can know the connotations of the unpleasant and benign vision, and here from the website gptafser.com/ we explain to you the interpretation of this vision, so follow along with us. The interpretation of seeing reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream for a single girl. The interpretation of seeing Ayat al-Kursi in a dream for an unmarried girl varies depending on the state of the vision. If he reads it in a dream, he will get rid of harmful magic. But if she sees that someone read Ayat al-Kursi to her in a dream, then the vision is praiseworthy. This means that this person will help her reach success and prosperity. And help her get rid of all the problems and worries that hinder her life, with permission. God. The unmarried girl read Ayat al-Kursi and her voice was loud. She will stop committing sins and mistakes in her life, God willing. The vision also portends positive changes and a lot of goodness. If an unmarried woman reads Ayat al-Kursi to someone she does not know, she will communicate with someone soon. This The person will be in a God-fearing manner and will be happy, God willing. Seeing her reading Ayat al-Kursi among the jinn in a dream means that she is committing mistakes and sins. The vision is a message from God to stop until she feels God’s satisfaction with her. An unmarried girl seeing the jinn in a dream and then reciting Ayat al-Kursi for him without Fear. All her worries and sorrows will be lifted from her, God willing. Ayat al-Kursi in an unmarried girl’s dream means psychological comfort, calm and stability. And if she reads it in a beautiful and sweet voice, she is close to her Lord. If an unmarried girl reads Ayat al-Kursi with difficulty, this means that she is mistaken in herself. See also: Seeing a Qur’anic verse written in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream from fear in a dream for a married woman. Ayat al-Kursi in a dream for a married woman means the strength of her faith and closeness to God. She is a wife who loves her family and wants to take care of them. If a married woman sees herself reading a verse Al-Kursi constantly. It means that she is committed to reading the Qur’an in reality or that she wants to protect herself from evil and sorcery. If a married woman is suffering from an illness and sees herself reciting Ayat Al-Kursi, good news for him of recovery from illness and pain, God willing. If he is in debt to someone, then pay the debt he owes. If the jinn reads Ayat al-Kursi in a dream to a married woman, her worries will go away. And her upcoming state will change for the better, God willing. Ayat al-Kursi in a dream for a married woman, happiness and tranquility. A married woman saw in a dream reading Ayat al-Kursi, she cried. Basra fulfills all her desires. If a married woman She reads Ayat Al-Kursi to her children in a dream. Good news for a successful future and a prominent position. Interpretation of seeing Ayat Al-Kursi read in a dream due to fear in a dream about the man and its meaning. If a man reads Ayat Al-Kursi in his dream while he is afraid. He will be blessed with a lot of money and abundant sustenance, God willing. Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream For a man, and he has suffered from some problems. These problems will leave him and the one who had the problem will die, and God knows best. If a man sees his wife in his dream reading Ayat Al-Kursi, this is evidence of good morals, kindness, and people’s love for her. And evidence of the stability of marital life with his wife. If a man sees himself In a dream and

title: Interpretation of a dream about burning my daughter’s hair in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing scissors in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing scissors in a dream: Seeing scissors in a dream in front of an honest Savior has many interpretations and indicators that many people ignore, because they show goodness in some dreams, and others indicate evil, and this shakes the dreamer when the dreamer sees it in his dreams. And he puts scissors in his vision, and the main interpreters of Imam al-Sadiq explained this vision in detail, as Imam Ibn Shirin and Ibn Shaheen interpreted it, as we have explained to you now. Interpretation of seeing scissors in a dream according to Imam al-Sadiq: A manicure in a dream symbolizes the healing of the sick, as well as the benefit of a righteous man. A cutting nail also symbolizes To the loyalty of a friend or lover. Nail scissors symbolize kindness, faith and love. Natural scissors symbolize conflict and difference. Regular scissors also symbolize differences and quarrels between family or friends and mean that there is envy among family members or friends. Walking scissors symbolize the sky near From its end. In general, trimming hair or nails is a symbol of earning a livelihood and good abundance on the way to you. Interpretation of seeing scissors in a dream for one girl. Seeing a haircut with scissors in a dream is for a girl who is truly getting rid of hatred. Just as cutting cloth with scissors symbolizes marriage or the appearance Good, close and happy news. Seeing scissors held in the hand, and not using them or cutting them, is a symbol of engagement or marriage. As for cutting nails with clippers, it symbolizes repentance from sin and may symbolize getting rid of what raises doubts in reality. Seeing scissors in a woman’s dream while she is seeing And she does not use it or hold it, it means trouble and conflicts with friends. Small scissors on the girl’s bed symbolize a short marriage. Interpretation of seeing scissors in a married woman’s dream. Scissors in a married woman’s dream symbolize marital disputes and family problems. Cutting cloth in a dream also symbolizes important decisions. In life. As for her husband cutting his hair or cloth, it symbolizes the husband’s livelihood and kindness through it. Cutting a ribbon in a dream symbolizes an urgent pregnancy, God willing. As for cutting nails, it is a symbol of repentance from sin. Small scissors on the bed of a married woman, symbolizes the husband’s distance. About her for a period of time. Interpretation of seeing scissors in a pregnant woman’s dream. Scissors in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes safety during pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. It also symbolizes a male child, and God knows best. Holding scissors and cutting hair or nails symbolizes freedom from fears and problems and repentance from sins. Cut cloth in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes goodness and abundance of livelihood. Small scissors also symbolize the safety of the fetus, God willing. Nail scissors in a dream. Nail scissors in a sick person’s dream is evidence of recovery. In a man’s dream, good morals and religion are good news for a close marriage, and an abundance of happiness. And an indulgent life. Scissors are nothing but good company and praiseworthy changes in life and may indicate the loyalty of a friend and lover. Whoever sees small nail scissors in his dream indicates the abundance of food and money coming from a known source, and in a pregnant woman’s dream the good news of an approaching situation

title: Interpretation of a dream about shackles in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing chains in a dream, as chains are iron rings or chains that express the person’s limitation and inability to move or move, so this dream always makes the dreamer feel very uncomfortable and tries to find an interpretation for this dream and you will try to do so. Helping readers to identify some expressions to know the restrictions in a dream in different scenes with the meaning to emphasize to readers not to conclude what we will provide from interpretations in any other vision because the interpretation of the vision does not depend only on the scenes of the vision, but it depends on many factors, including some of the circumstances surrounding the dreamer, which the interpreter first identifies before interpreting the dream. Interpretation of seeing chains in a dream by Ibn Sirin No, the scholar Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing chains in a dream for a traveler may indicate the length of time the traveler spent away from home. Also, if we dream of imposing restrictions on the patient, this may be a symbol of a long period of time for illness. As for if the dreamer sees himself in a dream tied with a rope, this may indicate the stability of religion, and God knows best. Also, seeing silver chains in a dream may be an indication of the stability of married life, and God knows best. But if the chains in the dream are made of gold, this may be an indication that something has returned. Ibn Nasrin believes that seeing chains in a dream in general indicates enemies, while seeing broken chains in a dream indicates the ability to survive, and God knows best. Seeing a tied hand Chains in a dream If you dream that a hand is chained in a dream, this indicates that there are many difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life. As the hand was chained in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer cannot achieve the dreams he wants to achieve, and God knows best. Seeing a chained leg in a dream When you dream of a limited market in a dream, this may be an indication of a set of difficulties that the dreamer will face while trying to achieve the goals he seeks, and God knows best. And since the dead person was chained in a dream, this indicates that this person has many debts that he was unable to pay before death, and God knows best. Seeing chains in a single woman's dream An unmarried girl who sees chains in a dream, this may be an indication of this girl's family commitment. Also, a single girl who dreams of chains in a dream indicates that there are many obstacles that stand in the way of this girl as she seeks to achieve her dreams. Seeing chains in a dream for a married woman A married woman who sees chains in a dream ultimately does not mean that this woman is actually suffering from a psychological disorder, and God knows best. Just like a married woman seeing chains in a dream, it shows that there are many situations that she goes through This woman has in real life that she cannot face. The restrictions in a married woman's dream indicate the emotional and physical need of the married woman. It can also generally indicate that the woman suffers from a set of problems

title: Seeing a deceased person in good health in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the deceased in good health in a dream. Jurists say that seeing the dead person coming to the living in good health is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of sustenance in addition to his good circumstances in the world, and the vision indicates that the deceased. It is his highest place in the House of Truth. Seeing one of the dreamer’s deceased relatives in good health in a dream blessed with goodness or wearing new clothes is an expression of the dead person’s entry into Paradise, God willing. Seeing one’s parents in a dream in good health, while he is basically dead, is a vision that indicates the guidance of his companion. Vision and justice towards them in this world and their satisfaction with it, in addition to increasing the solution of livelihood and solution. For all problems and fears. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing the dead person in good condition is evidence of the blessing of the grave and acceptance of the good deeds he has done. The dream of the dreamer shaking hands with one of the dead and rising from the dead is a vision that expresses his constant striving and his ability to overcome difficulties and achieve desires that were impossible for him. Interpretation of the vision The dead person is in good health in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin and the scholars of jurisprudence indicated that this vision carries many interpretations depending on the condition of the dead person. Seeing him sitting with the dead for a long time or hugging the living for a long time is a good vision and shows longevity and blessings in life, but if he suffers from a problem or Difficulties in life, it will be so. It was resolved soon. Ibn Sirin saw the dead person alive and then dying again, he interpreted it as getting rid of the anxiety and problems that the dreamer is suffering from, in addition to the fact that the vision has a psychological rift, which is a lot of thinking about death. Seeing a dead person should be taken as He gives you advice, warning, or warns you not to do something seriously, as seeing the dead is a real matter and he is in the house of truth and we are in the house of falsehood, but if he tells you or asks. You are something that angers Almighty God. It is a vision of Satan, so do not worry. Interpretation of seeing dead people in good health in a dream for a single woman. Jurists have indicated that an unmarried girl sees a dead person in her dream coming to her as if he were alive. It is a vision that brings her a lot of goodness and is an indication of Achieving difficult desires in life. Ibn Shaheen believes in the interpretation of this vision that it is a sign of goodness, abundance and blessings in life. The vision also expresses the path of righteousness that the girl follows. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream one of her deceased parents coming to her smiling and in good health or offering her A gift, as this is one of the important visions that express the approaching marriage to a good young man, and you will be very happy. Together from. An unmarried girl who sees a deceased person frowning at her face or wearing shabby clothes is a metaphor for worldly problems for her if he is unknown, but if she is known to her then this vision symbolizes his need for charity. The interpretation of seeing a deceased person in good health in a dream for a married woman has been indicated by jurists. However, seeing a deceased person in good health in a married woman’s dream is one of the visions related to the reality of her married life, so the vision indicates stability and happiness.

title: Interpretation of seeing Saudi Arabia in a dream in detail

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of seeing the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in a dream, as visiting the Sacred House of God and the Noble Prophet’s Mosque is one of the wishes that every Muslim from all over the world dreams of and adheres to this desire at times. They are reflected in the thoughts of their subconscious, which they see in their dreams. Through the following lines from the encyclopedia website, we learn with you about the meanings that dream interpretation scholars have said about these visions in a dream, so follow us. Written on the flag, this vision symbolizes the good morals that the dreamer also has. He also promised him that God Almighty would provide him with many good things in his life. Saudi Arabia in the Singles’ Dream One of the good visions for an unmarried woman is to see in her dream that she is traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, as this fever indicates that this girl will be engaged to a man who has a lot of knowledge and a high degree of sincerity, piety, and piety. . Piety and prosperity, and if the girl agrees to marry him, she will live a happy life with him while maintaining her obedience to God Almighty. And if the girl sees that she is traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by sea and boarding a ship, then this dream symbolizes that the fortuneteller will meet many people who are missing from her. If a girl is living in a state of sadness and feels a lot of bad feelings, then this dream is news to her from God Almighty that He will give her a lot of goodness and replace the feelings of sadness that she feels with feelings of happiness. And fun. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Saudi Arabia for a married woman. One of the most promising dreams for a married woman is to see that she or her husband travels to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. This dream is good news from God Almighty that her husband will obtain a new source of livelihood or that his job will advance. Some commentators said that seeing a married woman traveling to Saudi Arabia symbolizes that the financial problems that she and her husband are suffering from will end, God, and their living conditions will change for the better. From the visions The promise is for a married woman who has not yet given birth. If she sees in her dream that she is traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, this vision tells her that God Almighty will give her a good child whom her eyes will accept soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Saudi Arabia for a pregnant womanTravelling to Saudi Arabia in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the promising visions whose interpretation varies according to the details that She saw it in her dream. If a pregnant woman sees that she is traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to perform the Hajj, then this dream means that God Almighty is giving her a male child. And if she dreams that she is traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to perform the Hajj, this vision symbolizes that God Almighty is giving her Baby girl. Seeing a pregnant woman traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is a praiseworthy dream because it indicates in all circumstances that God Almighty
